Name: Snake Flute
Description: Reposition the top OR bottom of a Snake anywhere in 5x5 area around the User.

Name: # in a bottle
Description:
Before this item is obtained, roll 1D6 and replace the "#" with the result.
Move # number of Spaces forwards.

Name: Shank
Description: Steal 5 Gold.

Name: Grenade
Description:
Throw a Grenade which Explodes 3x3 at the Start of your Next Turn.
All Players who are inside the Explosion Lose 12 Gold.

Name: Teleportation Trash Can
Description: At the End of your Turn, Teleport to a Random Space.

Name: Uno Reverse Card
Description:
Choose a Player, their Current/Next Move Dice Roll is Negative.
If used on the User's Move Dice, must be applied BEFORE Moving.
NOTE: Player still gains regular amount of Gold.

Name: Discount Coupon
Description:
Roll your Dice and Gain double the amount of Temporary Gold.
NOTE: Caps at 50 Temporary Gold.

Name: Blunderbuss
Description:
Target is moved back by User's Dice Roll and Steals Gold based on the number.
NOTE: Negative number still Steals the normal amount of Gold.
NOTE: Steal Caps at 75.

Name: Feather
Description: Choose up to 2 Players within a 5x5 to move up 1 Space.

Name: Coffee
Description:
Choose a Player to gain Advantage until the End of their Turn.
NOTE: Advantage applies on all their Dice Rolls.

Name: Spoiled Milk
Description:
Choose a Player to gain Disadvantage until the End of their Turn.
NOTE: Disadvatange applies on all their Dice Rolls.

Name: Cantrip of Guidance
Description:
Choose a Player, they can add +1d4 to Any Dice Roll this Turn.
NOTE: This converts to Move Points on Move Dice, does NOT give Gold.

Name: Key of Possibilities
Description: Chest pool reward is increased by 3.

Name: Deck of Cards
Description:
Draw a Random card and move that many Spaces, do not gain Gold.
Drawing a Joker means you can pick any number between 1-13 and move that number of Spaces.

Name: Spooky Jumpscare
Description:
Move a Target 3 Tiles forwards.
They do not count as Passing any Spaces.

Name: Building Access Card
Description:
Access any Building in a 5x5 around the User, does not count towards Pass Trigger counter.
NOTE: Cannot access Chests or Gifts.
NOTE: Can only trigger Buildings with either a Start Turn or Pass Trigger.

Name: Clover Leaf
Description:
Reroll Any Dice, can Reroll any Loot pool including: Chests, Exchange Vouchers, Shops, Gachapons and more.
NOTE: CANNOT Reroll pure Random outcomes.

Name: Over-Alarm Clock
Description:
Restore 10 Artifact Refill on use.
You can use your Artifact ability for free one additional time this turn.

Name: Flashbang
Description:
Throw a Flashbang which Explodes in a 5x5 at the Start of your Next Turn.
All Players inside the Explosion cannot use Rerolls or Constants this Turn, and have a 1D2 of Destroying the first item they use.
NOTE: The 1D2 only triggers on the very first item, does not apply afterwards even if the Player doesn't Destroy the item.

Name: Nerf Gun
Description:
Choose a Player, they choose an item in their inventory to replace it with a Random item that is 1 Tier lower.
NOTE: T1 downgrades to a Random T0 Curse, while T0 items are Destroyed.

Name: Red Card
Description:
Go backwards 3 Spaces on use.
If this item is Discarded, you can choose to immediately end your Turn the moment it's Discarded.
NOTE: Second effect only applies for Discard, not converted, replaced, or anything else.

Name: Exchange Voucher
Description:
Exchange a chosen item for 1 of 3 choices of a random item of the same Tier.
NOTE: Exchanging a Curse will give you 3 Unique Curse choices.

Name: Radio Antenna
Description:
Buffs the next item Range to a minimum of 7x7 OR increases AoE until the Start of your Next Turn.
Line of Sight can also be used as a 7x7 on User from Range increase.
NOTE: Range and AoE increase does not apply to Line of Sight Projectile or Bound.
NOTE: AoE increases by 1x1 -> all Adjacent -> 3x3 -> 5x5 -> 7x7. (effect stacks incrementally)

Name: Pipis
Description:
Gain 1 Constant.
A Constant is a number that can be added OR subtracted from Any Dice Roll.

Name: Escape Rope
Description: If you will Trigger a Hazard at the Start of your Turn, you can choose to instead Move 1 Space in any direction (up down left right) and Start your Turn from there.

Name: Misprinted Membership Card
Description:
Before accessing the Shop, you can Roll 1D4 to change your Shop Tier:
1 = T1 Shop
2 = T2 Shop
3 = T3 Shop
4 = Choose Any Tier

Name: Safety Net
Description: All Players in a 3x3 gain 1 free "1 Constant" and "Dice Reroll" for 2 Turns.

Name: Key of Opportunities
Description:
When opening a Chest, you can choose an item aspect where the chest loot ONLY contains items which match that aspect.
Includes: Type, Theme, Version

Name: Misplaced Keys
Description:
When opening a Chest, you can additionally choose a 3x3 anywhere.
At the Start of your Next Turn, teleport all Players in the Target Space's 3x3 to the 3x3 around the Chest.

Name: Misfortune Cards
Description:
Choose a Player and guess their Move Dice Roll (before rolling).
If the final result matches your number, Gain 20 Gold (if chose User) OR Target Loses 20 Gold otherwise.
If you chose a Target, they do not get 1 free Reroll to their Move Dice.
NOTE: Target's Move Dice roll is considered a Dice Standoff, so you can use Constants and Rerolls to modify their final Dice result.
NOTE: All 0 Results for the Move Dice autocorrect to a 1 Result.

Name: Dome Shield
Description:
Throw a Dome Shield which creates a 5x5 AoE around the Temporary Creation.
All item Ranges and AoE from all Players outside the Shield's AoE do not extend inside the Shield, and vice versa.
Lasts until the User's Next Start Turn.
NOTE: This does not negate Radar Helmet.

Name: Scissors
Description:
Create 2 3-width edge Portals in legal positions within a 5x5 around the User and mark 1 of its face for each with arrows, which lasts until the Start of the User's Next Turn.
Each portal connects 2 separate Spaces as if they're Adjacent, where moving through the Portal leads to the connected Space.
NOTE: Both Portals cannot intersect each other.
NOTE: Both sides of a Portal must lead to a valid Space.
NOTE: Illegal Portals are not spawned, such as 1 Portal side being missing or 1 side leading to a wall.

Name: Potion of Invisibility
Description: Choose a Player, they can now place Hazards/Buildings directly on top of Players during their Turn.

Name: Prison Cube
Description:
Throw a Prison Cube which triggers in a 5x5 at the Start of your Next Turn.
Move all Players in the 5x5 around it to the center of the 5x5.

Name: Monopoly Money
Description:
Gain 30 Temporary Gold.
Everytime you buy an item from the Shop, roll 1D4.
Rolling a 1 loses all the Temporary Gold obtained items from the Shop, ends your Turn, and Stuns you next Turn.

Name: Growth Ray
Description:
Enlarge the Target's hitbox in a 3x3 around them as if they're on the Space, effect Ends at the Start of the User's Turn.
NOTE: Target breaks all Rocks nearby and adds their hp as Lingering Move Points to the Target.
NOTE: The user will trigger Duplicate Traps and can Pass Trigger Buildings within the Enlarged Hitbox.

Name: Spatial Grenade
Description:
Throw a Spatial Grenade which Explodes in a 3x3 at the Start of your Next Turn.
Teleport all Players inside the Explosion into the Spatial Hallway and create a Spatial Anomaly in the middle of the 3x3.
NOTE: Targets will exit the Spatial Hallway from the middle of the 3x3 area.

Name: Diamond Dentures
Description: Eat/Destroy a Building to gain 2 Constant or 2 free Reroll.

Name: Dubious Warp Crystal
Description:
Teleport a Player to any Waypoint on the Board, telepoted Player has 1D4 of losing a Random Item.
NOTE: Premade Waypoints must be Unlocked for the User to teleport the Player there.

Name: Table Legs
Description:
Choose a Space and roll your Move Dice to move the Space Modifications on it (refer to NOTE).
You can also use any Mobility, Reverse or Mobility items which ONLY apply to the User to move the Target Space.
If the Space Modifications cannot be applied in the new moved Space, the Target Space instead stays in its original spot.
NOTE: Only applies to: Hazards, Buildings, Temporary Creations, Snakes/Ladders.
NOTE: The Move Dice also gets 1 free Reroll similar to normal Move Dice.
Blurb: It couldn't have just grown legs and walked away!

Name: Lottery Ticket
Description:
Choose a Number up to your Dice Maximum and roll your Dice 3 times.
If all Dice Faces are the same by the End of the User's Turn, gain Gold equal to the Number times 10.
NOTE: The 3 rolled dice are Quantity Rolls, so Constants don't cap out.

Name: Grapple Gun
Description:
Create a Ladder (both top and bottom) anywhere within a 5x5 on User.
NOTE: Can be placed directly on a Player.
NOTE: Gold is still Gained by going up the Ladder.
Range: 5x5 on User, both top and bottom

Name: Tesseract
Description:
Choose a Row/Column and Shift all [affected] on it by 1-5 Spaces along any direction chosen by the User.
NOTE: [affected] = Hazards, Buildings, Temporary Creations, Snakes/Ladders, Chests and Players

Name: Treasure Map
Description:
Roll 1D6, 6 = create a Chest within a 5x5 on User.
The Chest is automatically opened after this item is used.

Name: Morally Ethical Teleportation Device
Description: Swap Spaces with a Target.

Name: Hitbox Extender
Description:
Overwrite an Adjacent Space to the Target Space with a duplicate of the Target Space, CANNOT Target a completely Blank/Regular Space.
NOTE: Duplicated Space Modifications include: Hazards, Buildings, Chests, Temporary Creations.
NOTE: Does NOT duplicate Portals, Snakes/Ladders or Players.

Name: Ghost Costume
Description:
Until the End of your Turn, Steal 6 Gold and give Disadvantage to all Players you Pass.
NOTE: Effect can be applied multiple times.

Name: Hot Potato
Description:
Timer starts at 0 and increases by 1 per Round.
This item Explodes/Destroys itself the moment the timer hits 3, where all Players around a 5x5 on the User (including the User themselves) loses 25 Gold and Discard 1 item.
NOTE: This item is Forcefully Given to the first Player you Pass.
NOTE: If you Pass 2 Players on the same Space, you can choose who gets it. (The chosen Player will still Pass the other at the Start of their Turn, giving it to them)

Name: Skipping Rope
Description:
This Turn, you now move 1 additional Space forwards whenever you Move along the board normally.
NOTE: Counts as Passing the Space but cannot use Pass Trigger Buildings as it requires you to be on the same Space.

Name: Radar Helmet (Active Piece)
Description:
Your item Range additionally extends from other players this Turn.
Refill +7

Name: Coffee Delivery Service
Description:
All Players Gain 3 "Coffee" Items.
Players who do not have enough inventory room can choose to Discard the Coffee in exchange for Losing 5 Gold and gaining Disadvantage per Coffee.

Name: X-Bomb
Description: Place a Bomb which explodes in an X Pattern in all directions infinitely, Lose 25.

Name: Fisher Hook
Description: Pull a Target 1 Space towards the User.
Range: Line of Sight inf Bound, Target

Name: Fragility Essence
Description:
This turn, Destroy all [affected] after use, lasts until the Start of the User's Next Turn.
NOTE: [affected] = Hazards, Buildings, Snakes/Ladders

Name: Mop
Description:
Choose a Hazard/Temporary Creation within a 3x3 and roll based on its Tier to Destroy it:
1D4 for T1 where 1 = Mop is Destroyed
1D2 for T2 where 2 = Destroy
1D4 for T3 where 4 = Destroy
If Mop successfully Destroys a Hazard, this Item does not get Destroyed.
Can only be used Once per Turn.

Name: Transmutator
Description: Change a Ladder into a Snake and vice versa.

Name: Dice Betting Game
Description:
Choose a Target rolls your Dice against theirs.
The person with the higher value Steals Gold from the Target based on the winning value, caps at 50.
NOTE: Constant and Reroll items can be both used here and on the opponent's Dice.

Name: Energy Drink
Description:
Gain 2 Constant.
Constants can now Multiply this turn.

Name: Key of Multiplicity
Description: When opening a Chest, you can instead duplicate a Random Item from anyone's Inventory.

Name: Junk Cannon
Description:
Choose any item in your inventory for the Target to Forcefully Gain.
The Target Loses Gold equal to the item's Cost+Tier.
NOTE: If an item with "Melancholic Recollection" is regained, do not apply the effect.

Name: Potion of Jump Boost
Description: Choose a Player, their Move Points go vertically upwards instead of horizontal this turn.

Name: Handheld Stop Sign
Description: Until your Turn, all Targets stop before Passing you.

Name: Catalyst Converter
Description:
Refund an item for Gold based on its Cost.
NOTE: Can be used while Gaining an item.
NOTE: Can refund a Curse for 0 Gold.

Name: Glass of Limeassist
Description:
Gain 2 Constant.
Constants can now Divide this turn.

Name: Prickly Pear
Description: Gain 5 Constant and -5 Lingering Move Points.

Name: Stubborn Clam
Description:
While held, you can roll your main dice to attempt to open this once per turn.
If it's a 15 or higher, turn this item into a Pearl.

Name: 5G Brain Broadcaster (Active Piece)
Description:
Roll your Move Dice and Move the Target forward or backwards based on that.
You can also use any Mobility, Reverse or Mobility items which ONLY apply to the User to move the Target.
Refill +6
NOTE: Move Dice has 1 free Reroll like normal.

Name: Exo Armor Plating (Passive Piece)
Description:
The next 1D2 Stun effect is now 1D4 where 1 is Stun.
Refill +5

Name: Self Destruct Button (Active Piece)
Description:
Stun all Players in a 5x5 (including the User).
Refill +3

Name: Energy Core (Active Piece)
Description:
You can use as many Artifact Abilities as you want for free this Turn without triggering its Refill.
On your 3rd Ability usage and onwards, whenever you use an Artifact Ability, roll 1D2.
1 = End your Current Turn, get Stunned Next Turn, and reset the Ability's Refill counter back to 0.
Refill +5

Name: Warp Drive (Passive Piece)
Description:
At any time and as many times, you can pay 10 Gold to gain a "5 Constant".
Refill +7

Name: Antique Coin
Description:
While held, you can Roll 1D2 where 2 = Gain 5 Gold.
Destroy this Item if it rolls a 1.

Name: Babbling Brook
Description:
Item Modifier, All Players in a 5x5 on User (including User) Lose 10 Gold, Gain 20 Temporary Gold, and Forcefully Gain the "Snake Venom" Curse.
This Item can only be used when combined with another item, which can be done at any time.
NOTE: Only 1 Item Modifier per item maximum.

Name: Golden Glaze
Description:
When used, gain 2 Gold whenever you use another item this Turn.
This Item can only be used when combined with another item, which can be done at any time.
NOTE: Only 1 Item Modifier per item maximum.

Name: Melancholic Recollections
Description:
Item Modifier, whenever this item is lost (Discarded, Destroyed, Stolen, used), roll 1D2 where 2 = Forcefully Gain the item back.
NOTE: This Item Modifier can be applied onto any item Type.
NOTE: If this item is getting Stolen but Rolls a 2, the Target does not successfully Steal the item.
NOTE: If this item is Exchanged using the Exchange Voucher, it will undo the Exchange if a 2 is Rolled.
NOTE: Discarding this item while in a Shop or Chest also counts and rolling a 2 will Forcefully Gain it back.

Name: Bananarang
Description:
Throw within Line of Sight inf and triggers at the Start of User's next Turn.
The first Player within Line of Sight (including the User) Loses 5 Gold, gets Stunned and creates a Banana Peel on them, priority starts backwards.
If this does not intersect with a Target, apply this effect to the furthest backwards Space within Line of Sight.
NOTE: If a Banana Peel cannot be placed, do not place it.

Name: Swarm of Mosquitos
Description: Lose 4 Gold and gain -1 Lingering Move Points, effect does not expire until you leave the Space OR you have 0 Gold.

Name: Gas Mine
Description:
Place Gas Cloud in a 3x3 around the Hazard, has a duration of 3 turns.
Targets who Start their Turn in a Gas Cloud gain -2 Lingering Move Point and Lose 5 Gold.

Name: Anti Water
Description:
Your next Move Dice is negative.
NOTE: User still gains regular amount of Gold.

Name: Banana Peel
Description:
Roll 1D2 to get Stunned.
1 = denying the next Move Dice.

Name: Bear Trap
Description:
Gain -4 Lingering Move Points, must move 4 times to escape.
NOTE: Subtracts from Move Points, but the User gains 1 free Move Point if they will Move 0 Spaces.

Name: Landmine
Description:
Explodes in a 3x3 at the Start of the User's Next Turn.
All Players within the explosion Lose 10 Gold and Stun.

Name: Border Control
Description: Lose 10 Gold.

Name: Web Slinger
Description:
Create a Spider Web on the Target Space.
Pull the User to the Space Adjacent to the Target Space in the direction of Line of Sight.

Name: Spider Web
Description: Divides your Move Dice by 2, rounded down.

Name: Low Poly Textures
Description:
Replace a Random item in your inventory with another Random item that is 1 Tier lower.
NOTE: T1 downgrades to a Random T0 Curse, while T0 items are Destroyed.

Name: Snake Pit
Description: If Move Dice is 3 or less: Lose 11 gold and gain the "Snake Venom" Curse.

Name: Naval Mine
Description:
Explodes in 5x5 at the Start of the User's Next Turn.
All Players within the explosion Lose 25 Gold and Stun.

Name: Limitless Butter Pump
Description: Forcefully Gain a "Liquid Popcorn" Curse.

Name: Donation Bin
Description: Choose 1 item to Discard.

Name: Arrow
Description:
Ending on this tile moves you 1 space in that direction (rotatable).
NOTE: Up to 5 Arrows can be connected together to transport the User, inf loops or anything above 5 Arrows does not trigger.
NOTE: If this Hazard has its effect applied in some way without placing it (Hunting Trophy, Spiky Helmet), the User can choose any direction.

Name: Difficult Terrain
Description:
Gain Disadvantage for All Dice Rolls until the End of your Turn
NOTE: Disadvantage is roll 2 times and use the lowest value.

Name: Lingering Potion of Weakness
Description: Forcefully Gain a "Weakness Status" Curse.

Name: Whirlpool
Description: Lasts 3 turns, you must Roll 5 or more on your Move Dice to escape or get Stunned instead.

Name: Banana Blaster V1000
Description: Create 4 Banana Peels Adjacent to Target/Space hit.
Range: Line of Sight inf Projectile, Target

Name: Caltrops (Item)
Description:
Throw up to 3 Caltrops (Trap) within Line of Sight.
Caltrops (Trap) are -2 Lingering Dice Points.
NOTE: Caltrops can be placed directly on a player.

Name: Spatial Anomaly
Description:
Teleports you to the Spatial Hallway.
NOTE: See separate mechanics on how it works.

Name: Killbox
Description: Roll 1D2, 1: Teleport back to the Start Space.

Name: Reversal Totem
Description: Place 5 Reverse Tiles in a + pattern.

Name: Uh Oh! Banana Bazooka V3000
Description:
Fires in the chosen direction at the Start of your Next Turn.
All Players Lose 25 Gold, get Stunned, and creates Banana Peels in a 3x3 around the Target Space.
Range: Line of Sight inf Projectile, Target

Name: Go to Jail
Description:
You physically cannot leave this Space Number until you Escape.
At the Start of every Turn, you can either roll Doubles with d6 or pay 50 Gold to Escape.
Fee halves at the End of your Turn. (50 > 25 > 12 > 6 > 3 > 1)
Escaping allows you to continue your Turn to Roll the Move Dice like normal.
NOTE: Reroll and Constants only apply to one of the Dice.
NOTE: The Jail State vanishes if the Hazard is Destroyed.

Name: Missing Textures
Description: Forcefully Gain a "Corrupted Data" item.

Name: Field of Pollen
Description: For every Space you move, Roll 1D4 where 1 = Stun.

Name: Minor Prank
Description:
Explodes in a 7x7 at the Start of the User's Next Turn.
All Players within the explosion Lose 35 Gold, Stun and Discard 2 items.

Name: Chain and Dagger
Description:
Steal 8 Gold from a Target in Line of Sight.
Create a Bear Trap on the Target Space (on the Target) and 2 more towards the User.
Range: Line of Sight inf Bound, Projectile

Name: Speed Bump
Description: If you Roll above a 5 on your Move Dice, get Stunned instead.

Name: Barbed Wire
Description:
Forcefully Gain a "Wound" Curse for every 5 Move Points from your Move Dice.
NOTE: Rounded down, so 4 Move Points is gain nothing.

Name: Shopping Basket
Description:
During your Turn, you can hold onto overflow items.
At the End of your Turn, either pay 1 Gold for each overflow item or discard any item to be under the overflow limit.
NOTE: Items from Forceful Gain and Curses are still held in the inventory.

Name: Bandolier
Description:
Attune any 6 Unique Usable Items and record them here:
Once the 6 items have been Attuned, once per turn, you can roll 1D6 to use one of them at random.
NOTE: You CANNOT Attune an Item with the EXACT same Theme combination. (Mobility != Mobility/Hinder)

Name: Talisman
Description:
While held, choose 1 held Curse to nullify its "While held" effect.
This will continue to nullify it until the Curse is gone from your inventory.

Name: Buried Compass
Description:
Generate 5 Random Numbers:
If you Start your Turn on any of the Spaces, treat it as if it's a Chest and generate a new Random Number.
NOTE: If a Chest is on the Random Number, treat as 2 Chests.

Name: Darkwood Shank
Description: Once per Turn, if you Pass the same Target 3 times, choose any item they have and Steal it from them.

Name: Space Bag
Description: While held, Hazards and Buildings can be placed on any Space (except on Players) in the Spatial Hallway.

Name: Atomizer
Description:
For every Hazard/Building you destroy, increase this Counter by 2 to a maximum of 50.
When used, choose a direction and at End of your Next Turn, fire a laser in Line of Sight inf where all Targets in the path Lose Gold equal to the Counter.
The Counter is reset afterwards but this item is still kept.

Name: Ammonite
Description: While held, Rocks have 1D4 chance of giving a Fossil when destroyed (given on a 6).

Name: Hot Wheels
Description:
After using 4 Items, each item used afterwards gives 1 Gold in increasing increments of 1 to a maximum of 5 AND certain bonus effects.
1st item: 1 Gold 1x1 on User, 1D2 Stun all Targets
2nd item: 2 Gold
3rd item: 3 Gold, 3x3 on User, 1D2 Stun all Targets
4th item: 4 Gold
5th item: 5 Gold, 5x5 on User, Stun all Targets
NOTE: After using 5 more items to a total of 9 items, this effect ends to total Gain of 15 Gold.

Name: Cassette Tape
Description: While held, whenever you Reroll, you can save the first possibility you had originally to be used instead of the given Rerolled possibility.

Name: The Old One Two
Description: If you use a Constant, Gain a "2 Constant", only activates Once per Turn.

Name: Bargaining Chip
Description:
While held, you can Refund any item to the Shop at half price.
NOTE: Curses cannot be Refunded.

Name: Snake Eyes
Description:
Anytime you Roll a 1 (Quantity and Quality), you can choose to reroll 1 time again.
If you Roll a 1 again from the Reroll, lose 11 Gold and use the original 1 result.

Name: Pyrite Coin
Description:
Whenever the User directly loses Gold, regain Temporary Gold equal to the amount Lost.
NOTE: Applies to Steal and Lose, not spending, trading or storing Gold.

Name: Wild Energy
Description:
Turns into the next item you obtain.
NOTE: If multiple items are obtained at once, choose any of the obtained item.

Name: Gold Magnet
Description: At the Start of your Turn, Steal 4 Gold from all Targets within a 5x5 on you.

Name: House in a Globe
Description:
Choose a Building in your inventory and Attune it to this item to trigger its effect when used. Can only be used Once per Turn.
Roll 1D6 after being used where 1 = Destroy this item, Building effect applies first.
NOTE: Non-Euclidean Doorframe lasts until the Start of the User's next Turn.
NOTE: Attuning to a Rock or anything similar allows you to place it when this is used.
NOTE: Cannot Attune to any Gold Themed Buildings.

Name: Police Siren
Description:
When another Player Steals from you, trigger this effect on your Next Turn, ends at the End of your Next Turn.
If you End your Turn Adjacent to the same Target, reclaim the Stolen goods and Target loses 15 Gold.
If the stolen item is gone from the Target's inventory, instead Steal 20 Gold.

Name: Paralytic Poison
Description:
While held, whenever you Steal from a Target, give them -5 Lingering Move Points.
If they have Lingering Move Points already, roll 1D2 to Stun as well.

Name: On-Site Facility Card
Description:
Attune a Building that has a Fee, this Building can also be used at any Shop once per turn.
NOTE: Pass Trigger maximum does NOT apply.

Name: See-through Key
Description:
While held, before opening a Chest (even with keys), you can view the items you would've gotten.
You can also choose to reroll a Chest once for free.
NOTE: You can only view 1 possibility and cannot use different key combinations for different possibilities.

Name: Trade-in Coupon
Description:
While held, you can instead give any item in your Inventory to the Target when affected by Steal.
NOTE: One-use item.

Name: Coin of Silent Friendships
Description:
All Steal effects are multiplied by 1.5.
NOTE: Stacks Multiplicably.
NOTE: Bypasses the Steal Cap.

Name: Meal Ticket
Description: While in a Shop, you buy 1 item from "The Diner" for 12 Gold.

Name: Jewel
Description:
While held, Rolling the highest Face of the Dice gives you Gold equal to the Dice Maximum (D6 gives 6 Gold).
NOTE: Only active while there is 1 highest Dice Face.

Name: Trap Scavenging Kit
Description:
While held, Roll 1D2 whenever you place a Hazard:
2 = Retain the Hazard.

Name: Key Ring
Description:
All Key Items can be stored onto this item.
NOTE: Keys are still lost when used.

Name: Crown of Briars
Description: Gaining Lingering Move Points gives you Gold equal to half the amount rounded down.

Name: Dumbbell
Description: While held, a Constant can be converted into a 5 Constant, used Once per turn.

Name: Fortunate Pendants
Description:
Rerolls can now Reroll any Loot pool including: Chests, Exchange Vouchers, Shops, Gachapons and more.
NOTE: CANNOT Reroll pure Random outcomes.

Name: Brothless Bones
Description: While held, the User cannot be Stunned for 2 Turns in a Row.

Name: Clover
Description:
Rerolls can now Reroll any Loot pool including: Chests, Exchange Vouchers, Shops, Gachapons and more.
Lvl 1: Gain 1 free Reroll. (Refill 20)
Lvl 2: Give a Player Advantage/Disadvantage. (Refill 10)
Lvl 3: Give a Player Weighed or Impossibility modification until End of Player's Turn.
NOTE: CANNOT Reroll pure Random outcomes.
Blurb: You forgot about Dice Modification (Weighted) and (Impossibility) didn't you?

Name: Zipline
Description:
The Zipline creates Zipline Ladders instead of normal Ladders, which all get deleted before the ability is used again.
Lvl 1: Create a Zipline Ladder within a 5x5 on User, (Refill 25).
Lvl 2: You can choose to go up or down a Ladder when Starting a Turn on it.
Lvl 3: Can be used up to 2 times, increased 7x7 range, Cheaper Refill (Refill 15).
NOTE: Zipline Ladders can be created on top of Players.
Blurb: Bitten by a radioactive splinter, this Artifact allows you to TRAVERSE the Board and SCALE buildings with an infinite supply of Ladders.

Name: Wings
Description:
Lvl 1: Go up 1 Space. (Refill 20)
Lvl 2: Can choose another Target within 5x5 on User to apply Ability to, Cheaper Refill. (Refill 12)
Lvl 3: Ability: Line of Sight inf, any Targets you choose within Line of Sight inf go up 1 Space.
Blurb: An Artifact for the guy who replies to "What's up?" with "The Sky" and gets away with it.

Name: Pocket Dice
Description:
Lvl 1 Can switch between 1 Dice Result. for the User's Dice Rolls. (Refill 24)
Lvl 2 When rolling Move Dice, roll two and pick 1 result to use. (Refill 12)
Lvl 3 Can own an infinite number of Dice and choose between them Before rolling Move Dice.
NOTE: You start with a 6 saved at the beginning of the game.
NOTE: Cannot Swap the Target's Dice number during Dice Standoff.
NOTE: Switching the Dice Result for a Move Dice does NOT increase Refill.
Blurb: Unfortunately, there are no Dice Jails included with this Artifact to place your bad dice in.

Name: Credit Card
Description:
Lvl 1: When accessing the Shop, you can replace it with any Shop Tier from 1-3. (Refill 25)
Lvl 2: All Shop items have a 10% cashback.
Lvl 3: Buying items gives you reward points equal to its Tier which can be cashed out for Temporary Gold.
NOTE: You still require the actual Shop Tier to buy Dice.
Blurb: Any more benefits and this would be considered the Trump Card. (Don't mistake this for the Debit Card)

Name: Satellite Dish
Description:
Lvl 1: Buffs the next item Range to a minimum of 7x7, Line of Sight can also be used as 7x7. (Refill 20)
Lvl 2: Ability now increases Item Range AND/OR AoE. (effect stacks)
Lvl 3: All Line of Sight is buffed to inf, Cheaper Refill. (Refill 15)
NOTE: Range and AoE increase does not apply to Line of Sight Projectile or Bound.
NOTE: AoE increases by 1x1 -> all Adjacent -> 3x3 -> 5x5 -> 7x7. (effect stacks incrementally)
Blurb: For those who want to [TARGET BOUND - STRIKE IMMINENT] a party popper next to someone's ears.

Name: Backpack
Description:
The Backpack's Attune is used as if you had the item in your inventory and used it directly from there.
Lvl 1: Attune a T1 Item. (Refill 25)
Lvl 2: Attune a T2 Item.
Lvl 3: Attune Any Item.
Blurb: Sometimes if you put an item in here, it'll get duplicated and you can use it again and again.

Name: Tiny Town
Description:
Lvl 1: Use 1 Building in your inventory. (Refill 30)
Lvl 2: Ability increased up to 2 Buildings in your inventory.
Lvl 3: Ability increased up to 4 Buildings in your inventory.
NOTE: Fee of the Building is still used.
Blurb: To be a governor of a town within your own pockets â€” a Tiny Town.

Name: Hunting Trophy
Description:
Whenever a Target triggers a Hazard, choose one of your Attuned Hazard to additionally apply to them.
Base Ability is to place any Attuned Hazard in a 3x3 on User. (Refill 20)
Lvl 1: Attune a T1 Hazard
Lvl 2: Attune a T2 Hazard
Lvl 3: Attune a 2 T1 or 1 T2 Hazard
NOTE: Trap-Scavenging Kit now Refills the Artifact fully when Action is used instead of regaining the Hazard, Attuned abilities can still only be used once per turn.
NOTE: Duplicate Hazards do not apply twice to the Target.
Blurb: Rumors say that those who have a successful hunt wear a Spiky Helmet.

Name: Steel Toe Boots
Description:
Lvl 1: Go down 1 Space. (Refill 20)
Lvl 2: Any Player you Pass Loses 2 Gold. Cheaper Refill (Refill 14)
Lvl 3: Apply 1D2 Stun whenever you drop and land directly on top of another Player, increase Lose from 2 to 5 Gold.

Name: Spiky Helmet
Description:
Lvl 1: Targets who Start their Turn on you Trigger up to 1 Hazard in your Inventory.
Lvl 2: Range increase to 3x3 on User, increased up to 2 Hazards.
Lvl 3: Range increase to 5x5 on User, increased up to 3 Hazards.
NOTE: Duplicate Hazards do not apply twice to the Target.

Name: Training Weights
Description:
Lvl 1: Skip your Turn to gain a 5 Constant. (Refill 15)
Lvl 2: If you spend Constants on Move Dice, any Target you Pass rolls 1D2 for Stun.
Lvl 3: The ability can be used up to 5 times in a row with each Constant gained stacking up until the ability is cancelled.

Name: Voodoo Doll
Description:
Lvl 1: Give -3 L-Points to a Target in Line of Sight (Refill 20).
Lvl 2: Ability increased to gives Target -5 L-Point OR a "Cursed Pin" Curse.
Lvl 3: Whenever a Target has -25 or more L-Points at anytime during your Turn, Steal 25 Gold while removing all their L-Points. Refill decreased from 20 to 15. (Refill 15)
NOTE: Lingering Move Points shortened to "L-Point" for this description.

Name: Calculator
Description:
Lvl 1: If you use 2 or more Constants this turn, you can choose to keep 1, Cheaper Refill. (Refill 25)
Lvl 2: Store a Constant that you have to be used later, up to 4 UNIQUE Constants can be stored. (Refill 20)
Lvl 3: Constants can now Divide and Multiply, Cheaper Refill. (Refill 15)
NOTE: Multiply caps at the maximum for Quality Rolls, unbounded for Quantity Rerolls.
NOTE: Divide is rounded, and 0 Move is always set to 1 Move.

Name: Quilt
Description:
Lvl 1: Overlap a 3x3 area around the User with a Pocket Dimension. After 2 Turns, everything in the Pocket Dimension is saved somewhere else and disappears. Cheaper Refill. (Refill 30)
Lvl 2: Create 2 3-width edge Portals in legal positions within a 5x5 around the User and mark 1 of its face for each with arrows, which lasts until the Start of the User's Next Turn.
Each portal connects 2 separate Spaces as if they're Adjacent, where moving through the Portal leads to the connected Space.
Lvl 3: Pocket Dimension is increased to 5x5 area, Cheaper Refill. (Refill 20)
NOTE: Pocket Dimension stores Hazards, Buildings, Temporary Creations, Snakes/Ladders and Chests.
NOTE: In Spatial Hallway, Lvl1 is modified to a 3x1, Lvl2 can only target vertical edges and Lvl3 overlaps a 5x1.

Name: Eldritch Mop
Description: Destroys Hazards and Buildings.

Name: Expert Yoink Gloves
Description: Steal any item from the Target.

Name: Splash Potion of Weakness
Description: All Players in a 3x3 roll 1D2 for Stun and Forcefully Gain a "Weakness Status" Curse.

Name: Jolly Gift Airdrop
Description:
Create 6 "Gift" Buildings in random Spaces.
NOTE: A Gift is Pass Trigger, Gain 1 random item based on Chest prob.

Name: Fingertip of Midas
Description: Destroy all Buildings and Hazards Adjacent to the User and regain Gold equal to its Cost.

Name: Pocket Watch
Description: Gain 3 free Rerolls.

Name: Bottomless Pockets
Description: Steal all Buildings and Hazards on a Space.

Name: Gale Infused Fan
Description: Move all Targets or Temporary Creations in a 5x3 (long side) Adjacent to the User in the chosen fan direction by 5 Spaces.

Name: Anchor
Description: Immediately End your Turn on use, ignoring remaining Move Points.

Name: Rocket Fists (Passive Piece)
Description:
If you are directly ahead or behind a Target based on the Board, you can instead spend your remaining Move Points to Move them forwards/backwards instead.
Refill +3

Name: Stun Stick
Description:
Has 4 total charges which takes 1 per use, roll 1D2 when used.
1: Stun a Target.
NOTE: Can be used as many times as you want but still costs Charges.

Name: Scroll of Teleportation
Description: Teleport to a Space in a 5x5 around the User.

Name: Cone of Cold
Description:
All Targets in a Line of Sight 3 Cone gain -4 Lingering Move Points.
Lingering Move Points for the Target now consume 2 Move Points until the End of the User's Turn.
NOTE: Lingering Move Points do not go into decimals and instead stay at 1.

Name: Knight's Soul
Description:
Move in a legal L-Shape position.
NOTE: This does not teleport the User but physically Moves them, so is affected by Rocks, Portals and other things.

Name: Ticket to Brazil
Description: Send a Player to the Spatial Anomaly Dimension

Name: Unicorn Helmet
Description: All Spaces within a 3x3 on User are considered Hazards based on the User's inventory, lasts until User's Next Turn.

Name: Photocopier
Description:
Choose a Target and overwrite your inventory with all their items.
NOTE: Does not apply to:
Photocopier
Blurb: Hey, just wondering if you got your photos printed?

Name: Lockbox
Description:
Gain a Chest Reward, synergizes with Key Items.
Can be Rerolled with any Reroll Dice item.
NOTE: The Chest is treated as if it was on the same Space as the User.

Name: Stink Bomb
Description: All Players in a 3x3 range have double Disadvantage on all their Dice Rolls until the Start of their Next Turn.

Name: Otherworldly Keys
Description: When opening a Chest, you can additionally teleport all other Targets in a 5x5 to the Spatial Hallway.

Name: Scroll of Earth Wall
Description:
Create 3 Rocks perpendicular to Line of Sight.
Does not create a Rock directly on the Target.
NOTE: If range is enhanced, you can pick any orientation.

Name: Golden Bullet
Description:
Give a Target 10 Gold, Target loses 25 Gold at the End of their Turn.
NOTE: CANNOT be used on someone who has finished their last Turn in Gold Rush.

Name: Horse-Sized Lance
Description:
Steal Gold from Target for each Space traveled/Passed, up to 100.
Can only be used once per Turn.
NOTE: Snakes and Ladders use distance formula.

Name: Super Sprinters (Active Piece)
Description:
Multiply your Move Dice by 3 before Moving but get Stunned next turn.
Refill +5

Name: Bioluminescent Nuclear Parasite
Description:
Explodes on the User's Next Turn, where Players Lose Gold based in increasing increments of 10 from the edge towards the center/thrown item.
Whenever a duplicate of this Item is obtained, it is automatically merged together to increase the blast radius by 1. Capping out at 7 merges with 15x15 and Lose 70 max.
NOTE: Duplicating this item is only obtained at Lvl1.
NOTE: When 2 copies of this item combine, use the highest level and add +1 to it.
NOTE: Does not extend into the Spatial Hallway.

Name: Shaman's Book
Description: Choose a Row and fill it with Gas Clouds, all Players on the same Row Lose 5 Gold, Gain 10 Temporary Gold, and Forcefully Gain the "Snake Venom" Curse.

Name: Jungle Wood Warhorn
Description:
Apply all the following effects to all Players in a 5x5 around the User (including the User) for 3 Turns:
Gain Advantage on All Rolls.
Gain 1 Snake Flute usage for free once per turn.
Can choose to climb Snakes like a Ladder.
Refill all Artifact charges on use.

Name: Clementine
Description: Gain 4 Constant on use and Gain 4 "Clementine Slices".

Name: Garlic Butter
Description:
Item Modifier, grants 20 Refill on use, Artifact ability can be used 1 more time this Turn.
This Item can only be used when combined with another item, which can be done at any time.
NOTE: Only 1 Item Modifier per item maximum.

Name: Holographic Rock Projector (Active Piece)
Description:
Create a Rock in Line of Sight inf.
If the same Rock is within Line of Sight of User at the Start of User's Turn, heal the Rock to full.
Refill +7

Name: Biogas Combustion Furnace (Passive Piece)
Description:
You can sacrifice any 2 items (except for Curses) to Gain 1 free Reroll which lasts until the User's Turn.
Refill +8

Name: What's inside? Sponsored Crate
Description: Gain 4 Random T1 items.

Name: The Bulk Gloves
Description:
Choose an Adjacent Space, the Target Space and the Spaces Adjacent to it in a 1x3 and upheave all Hazards, Buildings, Temporary Creations, Players and Chests on the Target Space 5 Spaces forwards.
If the Target Space intersects with a Target, destroy all Hazards, Building and Chests on the Target Space to Stun the Target, each Space Modification applies a various effect:
Lose 10 Gold per Building.
Lose 5 Gold per Hazard.
Lose a Random Item per Chest.

Name: Causality Hourglass
Description:
Skip your Turn on use to apply this effect on your Next Turn.
Roll 1 extra Dice for All Rolled Dice to pick 1 of 2 choices, until the End of your Turn.

Name: Dancer Shoes
Description:
Move 3 Spaces in any Adjacent direction 2 times separately.
NOTE: Moving into a wall/ceiling cuts off the remaining distance.

Name: Gravity Grenade
Description:
Choose a direction (up, down, left, right) and throw a Gravity Grenade which Explodes 3x3 at the Start of your next Turn.
All Players inside the Explosion Move in the chosen direction until they hit a wall/ceiling/floor, gaining Lingering Move Points equal to the number of Spaces Passed while Moving.
NOTE: If where the Player will go intersects the Space they're already on (via Portal), they do not Move.

Name: Relic Fragment
Description:
Pick an Artifact and use its ability up to your Artifact Lvl, lasting abilities will persist until the Start of your Next Turn.
If you collect 4 of this item, you can exchange all your Relic Fragments for any Lvl1 Artifact.
NOTE: Cannot obtain T0 Artifacts.

Name: Bandit Key
Description: Forcefully Gain the first 3 items from a Chest.

Name: Bad Luck Grenade
Description:
Attune to a Curse.
Throw this Grenade within Line of Sight inf, Explodes in a 3x3 at the Start of the User's Turn.
All Players inside the Explosion Forcefully Gain the Attuned Curse and Lose 12 Gold.
NOTE: Players do not gain a Curse if there was no Curse Attuned.

Name: Trumpet of Change
Description:
Rearrange up to 5 Building, Hazard, Player, Temporary Creation, Snake/Ladder, Portals or Chests to a different Space within a 5x5 on User on use.
NOTE: Range does NOT extend directly on top of Players, but you can rearrange Hazards first then Players last.
NOTE: Cannot move Portal Edges.

Name: Wand of Blast Wave
Description:
Holds 3 total Charges and costs 1 Charge on use, destroy this item at 0 Charges.
Choose a Target Space within Line of Sight and apply the below effect:
Players on the Target Space have 1D2 Stun.
Players on Adjacent to the Target Space Move 3 Spaces in the direction of the Adjacent Space and get Stunned if they hit (Move into) the wall/ceiling.
NOTE: Can be used as many times as you want but still costs Charges.

Name: Inverse Grenade
Description:
Throw an Inverse Grenade which Explodes 3x3 at the Start of your Next Turn.
All Players who are NOT inside the Explosion Lose 12 Gold.
NOTE: The Explosion AoE of this Grenade extends into the Spatial Hallway.

Name: Mirror Cube
Description:
Throw a Mirror Cube within Line of Sight inf which triggers at the Start of the User's Next Turn.
When triggered, create Portals on the Edge of the 5x5 area which last until the Start of your Next Turn, where each inwards Portal leads to the opposite inwards edge and vice versa.
NOTE: Illegal Portals are not spawned, such as 1 Portal side being missing or 1 side leading to a wall.
NOTE: Crossing the outwards Portal will also lead you to the opposite outwards Portal.

Name: Bell on a Stick
Description:
Until you Move, you can strike any Adjacent Targets or Buildings, Stunning all Players on the Target Space or Destroying the Building.
Every time you strike, all other Targets in a 5x5 around the Target Space Roll 1D4 for Stun.
NOTE: Item usage is immediate, so you cannot reposition after each strike.
NOTE: Cannot hit the same thing twice.

Name: Golden Handcuffs
Description:
Give the Target 12 of your Gold.
In exchange, Target gains -3 Lingering Dice Points and cannot use any items this Turn.
NOTE: This does not work if you do not have 12 Gold.

Name: Household Keys
Description:
When opening a Chest, you can instead choose to teleport onto any Space at the Start of your Turn.
You cannot claim the End Space Reward this Turn.
NOTE: Chest occurs first, Snakes/Ladders second, then tp onto any Space afterwards.

Name: Default Cube
Description:
Throw a Default Cube within Line of Sight inf as a Temporary Creation.
All Spaces in a 5x5 around the Target Space are considered Regular Spaces, replacing every Space modification except for Players.
Effect is removed at the Start of the User's Next Turn or if the Default Cube is destroyed.
NOTE: Does not replace Start or End Space.
NOTE: All Round/timed based Space modifications (both new and pre-existing) are treated as if it was just placed when the effect ends.
NOTE: Overlapped Spaces still follow the original Space's Space Modification rules.

Name: Gift Card
Description: Gain 25 Temporary Gold.

Name: Spicy Wings for Two
Description:
Choose up to 2 unique Players in a 5x5, one Player Gains 7 Constant while the other Forcefully Gains the "Hot Sauce" Curse.
NOTE: If you Choose 1 Player, you can choose either result.

Name: Sand and Land Burger
Description: Your Artifact Ability can be used up to 3 times for free.

Name: Santa's Goodie Bag
Description:
Choose a Player to either:
Option 1. Target Forcefully Gains 2 "Rock" Buildings.
Option 2. User picks one of their items for the Target to Gain.

Name: Replicating Virus
Description:
Choose any item with a 10 or less Cost.
Afterwards, all Players within a 5x5 on User Forcefully Gains a copy of the item.
NOTE: Can choose Curses.

Name: Potato Peeling Cell
Description: Start Turn (Fee: Skip your Turn), you may choose to Skip your Turn to gain 4 Gold or start your Turn from there.

Name: Toybox
Description: Pass Trigger, gain a "Mystery Toy" item.

Name: Rock
Description:
Must move 3 times total towards to break, blocks Line of Sight.
Progress towards breaking the Rock is kept.
NOTE: If a Player is somehow on the same Space as the Rock, destroy it and add all of its remaining hp to the Player as Lingering Move Points.

Name: Mortar
Description: Pass Trigger, Create a Grenade on any Space.

Name: Campfire
Description: Pass Trigger (Fee: Skip next Turn), you may choose to discard all Move Points and End your Turn early.

Name: Gyre of Gold
Description:
Pass Trigger, roll 1D6 with a x3 Gold multiplier, lose if odd and gain if even.
1 = -3 Gold
2 = 6 Gold
3 = -9 Gold
4 = 12 Gold
5 = -15 Gold
6 = 18 Gold

Name: Gold Mine
Description:
Generates 3 Gold at the end of every Round.
When Passed, collect all the Gold and reset the Gold counter

Name: 15th Century Cannon
Description:
Pass Trigger, Choose an Adjacent direction and fire a cannonball in that direction at the Start of the User's Next Turn.
The first Player within Line of Sight inf of the Cannon Loses 40 Gold which decreases for each Space from the Cannon.

Name: Sugar Rush Cake
Description: Pass Trigger, gain a "Super Sweet Slice".

Name: Lightning Rod
Description:
Pass Trigger, at the Start of your Next Turn, zap all Targets in a 5x5 around you, Stealing 15 Gold and give them Disadvantage.
If you hit no Targets, you Lose 10 Gold and gain Disadvantage instead.

Name: Lucky Shrine
Description: Pass Trigger, all Dice Rolls have Advantage, Next Move Dice has Advantage.

Name: Directional Sign Post
Description: Pass Trigger, you can choose to walk up, down or continue.

Name: Town Square
Description: Start Turn, Trigger all (Pass Trigger) Buildings Adjacent to this.

Name: Shop Tent
Description: Pass Trigger, access the Shop.

Name: Waypoint
Description: Start Turn, Teleport to Any Waypoint

Name: Boulder
Description:
Takes up 2x2 Spaces, must move towards 10 times in order to break,
NOTE: If a Player is somehow on the same Space as the Rock, destroy it and add all of its remaining hp to the Player as Lingering Move Points.

Name: The Diner
Description:
Pass Trigger, Roll your own Dice for 5 Gold to Gain a random item, can be done as many times as you want.
1 = Junk Food
2 = Vegetables
3 = Water
4 = Steak
5 = Sardines
6 = Clementine
7 = Hot Potato
8 = Frozen Yogurt
9 = Deflated Raspberry
10 = Tea
11 = Rock Candy
12 = Sand and Land Burger
13 = Brimming Glass of Spiders
14 = Sugar Rush Cake
15 = Spicy Wings for Two
16 = Shrimp Fried Rice
17 = Exploding Fruitcake
18 = Potion of Healing
19 = BBQ Sauce
20 = Everything Bagel
NOTE: Negative Faces use absolute value, Decimal Faces can choose to add 1 more to its own result.

Name: Cellular Tower
Description:
Pass Trigger, Buffs the next item Range to a minimum of 9x9 AND/OR increases item AoE until the Start of your Next Turn.
Line of Sight can also be used as a 9x9 on User from Range increase.
NOTE: Range and AoE increase does not apply to Line of Sight Projectile or Bound.
NOTE: AoE increases by 1x1 -> all Adjacent -> 3x3 -> 5x5 -> 7x7. (effect stacks incrementally)

Name: Pawn Shop
Description:
Pass Trigger, you can sell any item for 5 Gold per Tier.
NOTE: Curses cannot be sold.

Name: Hotel
Description: If you Start your Turn on this, Steal 20 Gold.

Name: Quarry
Description:
Pass Trigger, roll 1D2:
1 = Fill your inv with Rocks
2 = Gain a Fossil

Name: Punching Machine
Description: Pass Trigger (Fee: 5 Gold), if you Roll higher than a 10, gain 25 Gold

Name: Shady Alleyway
Description:
Start Turn (Fee: Any 2 items), all Steal effects are x1.5 until the Start of the User's Next Turn.
NOTE: Stacks Multiplicably.
NOTE: Bypasses the Steal Cap.

Name: Banana Rotato
Description:
Pass Trigger (Fee 5 Gold), roll 1D20.

1-5: Gain a Banana Peel
6-10: Gain a Bananarang
11-16: Gain Banana Blaster V1000
17-19: Gain "Uh Oh!" Banana Bazooka V3000
20: Gain 30 Gold

Name: 3D Printer
Description:
Pass Trigger (Fee 15 Gold): Gain a copy of any item in your Inventory.
Can duplicate items with applied Item Modifiers at 5 Gold per Modifier.

Name: Gachapon Machine
Description: Pass Trigger, Gain a Gachapon.

Name: Seer
Description: Pass Trigger (Fee: T2 OR T3 item), Gain 1 free Reroll that doesn't expire until used.

Name: Gold Tile
Description: Start Turn, Gain 8 Gold.

Name: Charging Station
Description: Start Turn, Refill your Artifact back to full.

Name: Take 2 Candy Bowl
Description:
Pass Trigger, can take as many Treats as want, after taking 2 Treats, each subsequent Treat has 1D2 of Forcefully Gaining a Trick instead and ending this interaction.
NOTE: "Treats" cannot be used for the 1D2 during this interaction.

Name: Enlightened Anvil
Description:
Start Turn (Fee 1 T3 Item), convert a Passive item into an Artifact or store it outside of the inventory permanently.
NOTE: Some Passives can still Destroy themselves.

Name: Deployable Spatial Overlapper
Description:
Overwrite the Row this Building is on with the Spatial Hallway, does not actually count as the Spatial Hallway dimension.
If multiple of this Building are placed, the Spatial Hallway copies over all changes.
When this Building is destroyed, restore the original Row.
NOTE: Placing things on the Deployable Spatial Anchor copies to the Spatial Hallway and all other duplicates of the Deployable Spatial Anchor.

Name: Golden Punching Bag
Description:
Must move 20 times total towards to break, blocks Line of Sight.
Whenever a Player moves towards it, they gain 1 Gold equal to damage dealt.
Progress towards breaking this Building is kept but Destroyed at the Start of the User's Next Turn.
NOTE: If a Player is somehow on the same Space as the Rock, destroy it and add all of its remaining hp to the Player as Lingering Move Points.

Name: Barbeque
Description:
Pass Trigger, can add the "Grilled" Item Modifier to any item in your inventory, which grants the item 1 additional usage.
NOTE: Cannot be used on an already Grilled item.

Name: Non-Euclidean Doorframe
Description: Leaving the Row this Building is on by Moving through the Board normally instead teleports you back to the start of the same Row.

Name: Bank Vault
Description:
Start Turn (Fee 5 Gold), you can add or take any amount of Gold into the Vault.
Every Round, add compound interest of 0.1 percent.
NOTE: All Gold in the Bank Vault is SHARED.

Name: Shrine of Stonks
Description:
Start Turn (Fee: 1 T3 item), all Gold and Temporary Gold gained this Turn is doubled.
NOTE: Steal is not doubled.

Name: Bubble Elevator
Description: Pass Trigger, Move Points go vertically upwards instead.

Name: Ender Chest
Description:
Pass Trigger: Store and withdraw an infinite number of items here.
Each Player has their own Ender Chest inventory.
NOTE: The Ender Chest inventory persists even after this Building is Destroyed.
NOTE: Curses cannot be stored in Ender Chest.

Name: Shrine of Change
Description: Start Turn (Fee: 1 Artifact), gain a Random Artifact of equal level

Name: Blacksmith
Description:
Pass Trigger, you can Exchange 3 Items of the same Tier for 1 or 3 choices of a higher Tiered item.
NOTE: Does apply to T0 items.

Name: Treasure Hoard
Description: Pass Trigger, Gain a "Lost Treasure" item.

Name: Custom Shipment Order
Description:
Place an order for any item while at a Shop for 2 times the price, cannot buy Artifacts or Tier 0.
Gain this item at the next Shop you Pass.
NOTE: Chosen item can be bought with Temporary Gold.

Name: Wishing Well
Description:
Start Turn (Fee: 1 Artifact), Gain Any 5 items
Note: Cannot obtain these items:
Any type of Artifacts
Items that are directly sold for Gold

Name: Portal Gun
Description:
Choose 2 Spaces to replace with a Portal.
Whenever the Portal is first Passed, the Player is automatically teleported to the other Portal.
Portals last until the Start of the User's Next Turn.

Name: Shrimp Fried Rice
Description:
Choose any number and replace Any Dice Roll with it.
NOTE: Only goes up to your Dice maximum (D6 = 1-6).

Name: LEGACY Santa's Goodie Bag
Description: Forcefully Give any Player 10 Gold or a "Rock".

Name: LEGACY Barbed Wire
Description:
Gain -0.5 Lingering Move Points and Lose 3 Gold based on the number of your Move Dice.
NOTE: Rate is -0.5 L-Point (rounded down) and +3 Gold per 1 Move Point.

Name: LEGACY Escape Rope
Description: Escape all Hazard and Building effects when used.

Name: Frozen Yogurt
Description: Choose a Player, Gain 1 Constant for 3 turns.

Name: Black Hole
Description: If you End your Turn Adjacent to this, get pulled to this Space

Name: Deflated Raspberry
Description: Choose a number between 1-5, gain that Constant and Lose 4 times the Gold.

Name: Boxing Day
Description:
Places your entire inventory in a Box in any Space at the End of their Turn.
A Box is a Building which is accessed through Pass Trigger.

Name: Sporknife
Description: Whenever the User uses a Food item, Gain 5 Artifact Refill.

Name: Stewing Pot
Description:
Pass Trigger, The User can combine the effects of up to 5 Food Items into a "Suspicious Stew" Item containing every effect.
NOTE: Cannot combine Suspicious Stew, Grilled items or Sauced items.

Name: BBQ Sauce
Description:
Item Modifier, the item this is combined with can be used 1 additional time.
This Item can only be used when combined with another item, which can be done at any time.
NOTE: Only 1 Item Modifier per item maximum.

Name: Weird Key
Description:
When opening a Chest, choose to replace its loot with equally weighted T0 items.
NOTE: Does not include Artifacts.

Name: LEGACY Trading Post
Description:
Players on the same Row as send and accept Trades from others.
Trades are basically to send and receive Gold, items or Artifacts.

Name: Rusty Key
Description: When opening a Chest, choose a version number, the Chest loot will only contain items from that version.

Name: LEGACY Scroll of Teleportation
Description: Teleport to a Space in a 3x3 around the User

Name: LEGACY Jewel
Description:
Lvl 1 Moving 6 spaces in 1 turn gives you 3 gold once per turn.
Lvl 2 Rolling the highest dice face gives you that much gold.

Name: LEGACY Sacrificial Effigy
Description: Converts all Move Points into Gold, do not Move.

Name: LEGACY Life Link Plugin
Description: Choose 2 Targets, all Hazard/Building effects gained are shared with the Target until your Turn.

Name: LEGACY Nuke
Description:
7x7 explosion, each layer has its own Lose amount, explodes on User's Turn.
Distance 1 (on the nuke) = 40 Gold
Distance 2 = 30 Gold
Distance 3 = 20 Gold
Distance 4 = 10 Gold

Name: LEGACY Voodoo Doll
Description: Target copies all of your DIRECTIONAL movements during this Turn.

Name: Tea
Description:
Roll your Dice and save the number.
This number can be substituted with Any Dice number one time, lasts until the End of your Turn.

Name: Can of Beans
Description: Gain 3 Constant and create a Gas Cloud on all Spaces Adjacent and on the User.

Name: Water
Description: Gain 1 Reroll, decrease Refill counter by 5 and Discard 1 Curse.

Name: Steak
Description: Move 8 Spaces and Gain 1 Constant.
Blurb: By the time you've smelled it, you have already Eradicated it.

Name: Sardines
Description: Go backwards 4 Spaces and create 4 Gas Clouds on each Space (starting from the Space you used the item).

Name: Vegetables
Description:
Gain 2 Constant.
If Grilled, change this effect to Gain 1-2 chosen Constant.

Name: Weakness Status
Description:
While held, gain -2 Lingering Move Points at the Start of every Turn.
Use: Gain -12 Lingering Move Points and Lose 3 Gold whenever you Move this Turn.

Name: Gift
Description:
Pass Trigger, Gain 1 Random Item from the Chest loot table.
NOTE: Does NOT count towards Pass Trigger maximum.

Name: Liquid Popcorn
Description:
While held, first item Rolls a 1D2 where 1 = Destroy the item instead.
Use: Destroy 3 chosen items, for each item you can instead choose a Player within a 3x3 to instead Destroy a chosen item.

Name: Caltrops (Hazard)
Description:
Gain 2 Lingering Move Points.
If you now have 5 or more Lingering Move Points, Gain a "Wound" Curse.

Name: Junk Food
Description:
While held, whenever your Move Dice Rolls a 5 or less, replace the result with a 1.
Use: Replace any Dice Result with a 1D2.

Name: Cursed Pin
Description:
While held, gain -5 Lingering Move Points whenever you change to a different row.
Use: Move 1 Space in any direction up to 3 times, Forcefully Gaining a "Wound" Curse for each movement.
NOTE: Must Move at least 1 time, cannot move 0 Spaces.
NOTE: Snake/Ladder and teleporting counts.

Name: Corrupted Data
Description:
While held, roll 1D4 where 1 = downgrade a chosen item.
Use: Downgrade 3 chosen items, can pick the same item multiple times but must do at least 3 times.

Name: Snake Venom
Description:
While held, at the Start of Turn increase this counter by 1 (0/3).
The moment this counter reaches 3, Lose 5 Gold to Gain 10 Temporary Gold. Reset the counter to 0 afterwards.
Use: Lose 15 Gold and gain 30 Temporary Gold, Lose 1 Gold whenever you purchase an item.

Name: Hot Sauce
Description:
While held, Start your Turn on the next Space ahead.
Use: Reroll your Move Dice as many times as you want to Move forwards, Lose 8 Gold each time.
NOTE: Move Dice must be rolled at least once for the Use ability.

Name: Brimming Glass of Spiders
Description:
Gain 8 Constant and Create Spider Webs around the User in a 5x5 area.
The User is immune to Spider Webs next turn.

Name: Pearl
Description:
Can be sold at shop for 25 Gold.
NOTE: Cannot be bought at the Store.

Name: Clementine Slice
Description: Gain 1 Constant on use.

Name: Rock Candy
Description:
Must be broken by Moving towards it 8 times, blocks Line of Sight.
The Player who breaks it Gains a Sugar Shard.
NOTE: If a Player is somehow on the same Space as the Rock, destroy it and add all of its remaining hp to the Player as Lingering Move Points.

Name: Sugar Shard
Description: Choose a number between 1-5 and Gain that many Constants and Gold.

Name: Exploding Fruitcake
Description:
Throw an Exploding Fruitcake which explodes in a 3x3 at the Start of the User's Next Turn.
All Players in a 3x3 AoE get Stunned, Lose 24 Gold, and Forcefully Gain 2 items from "The Diner" based on their Dice for free.

Name: Potion of Healing
Description: Gain 10 Constant and Discard all Curses from the Player, where each Curse Discarded reduces the Constant gained by 2.

Name: Portable Blender
Description:
The User can combine the effects of up to 3 Food Items into a "Suspicious Stew" Item containing every effect.
NOTE: Cannot combine Suspicious Stew, Grilled items or Sauced items.

Name: Everything Bagel
Description: Gain 20 Constant.

Name: Suspicious Stew
Description: This item contains the following effects below:

Name: Super Sweet Slice
Description: Gain Advantage and +4 Constant for 3 Turns.

Name: Super Duper Super Suit
Description:
Creating using 4 pieces with at least 2 Active pieces.
Uses all the abilities below: (Refill 10 + X)
Actives:
Passives:

Name: Gachapon
Description: Gain a Random T2 item.

Name: Trick
Description:
While held, Lose 5 Gold whenever you use a Building. (including Premade Buildings)
Use: Lose 10 Gold and this Turn, Forcefully Gain a "Treat" and 5 Gold whenever you use a Building.
NOTE: Pass Trigger maximum still applies to used Buildings.

Name: Treat
Description: Player Gains 1 free "Reroll" OR "1 Constant" on use (chosen by the User).

Name: LEGACY Prison Cube
Description: Lock the next item usage in a 3x3 area (except for mop) in a Space, lasts until the Start of the User's Next Turn.

Name: Mystery Toy
Description: Gain a Random T1 item.

Name: Lost Treasure
Description: Gain a Random T3 item.

Name: LEGACY Border Control
Description: Lose 10 gold when Passing this tile.

Name: Fossil
Description:
Sell at a Shop for 10 + 1D10 Gold.
NOTE: Cannot be Bought at the Shop.

Name: 1 in a Bottle
Description: Move 1 Spaces forwards.

Name: 2 in a Bottle
Description: Move 2 Spaces forwards.

Name: 3 in a Bottle
Description: Move 3 Spaces forwards.

Name: 4 in a Bottle
Description: Move 4 Spaces forwards.

Name: 5 in a Bottle
Description: Move 5 Spaces forwards.

Name: 6 in a Bottle
Description: Move 6 Spaces forwards.

Name: X Dice Face
Description: This item is applied to one of your Dice Faces to replace its result with X when Rolled.

Name: Yard Sale Permit
Description:
While held, you can choose any item in your inventory to be available for Players to buy at the Shop during their Turn for any price you set.
When a Player chooses to buy the item, another Player can choose to counter offer, in which case the User can choose which offer.
NOTE: Anything can be offered for the item, such as Gold or items.

Name: LEGACY Backpack
Description:
The Backpack's Attune is used as if you had the item in your inventory and used it directly from there.
Lvl 1: Attune Any TWO T1 usable items. (Refill 50)
Lvl 2: You now have infinite inventory spaces, gain -1 Move Points per overflow item.
Lvl 3: Attune Any. (Refill 25)
NOTE: The user can still move a minimum of 1 Space per turn from the Move Dice.
Blurb: Sometimes if you put an item in here, it'll get duplicated and you can use it again and again.

Name: LEGACY Tiny Town
Description:
Tiny Town's Attune is used as if you had the item in your inventory and you used your Lvl 1 or Lvl 3 ability with it.
Lvl 1: Use 1 Building in your inventory. (Refill 75)
Lvl 2: Attune any Building.
Lvl 3: Ability is now use up to 4 Buildings in your inventory.
NOTE: Using/Attuning to a Rock or anything similar allows you to place it.
NOTE: Cannot use or Attune to any Gold themed Buildings.
Blurb: To be a governor of a town within your own pockets â€” a Tiny Town.

Name: LEGACY Corrupted Data
Description:
While held, at the End of the User's Turn, roll 1D4:
1 = Replace 1 Chosen item with "Corrupted Data" other than with this item.
NOTE: Can only be applied one time, even if multiple copies of this are held.

Name: Natural Bog Water
Description:
Move 1-6 Spaces forwards and Lose Gold equal to twice the Spaces moved.
If you have a Curse, instead use the bottom effect:
Choose a Target Space within Line of Sight inf, all Players within a 3x3 AoE choose to either Lose 8 Gold or Discard 1 chosen item.

Name: Nope Card
Description:
If a Target uses an item, you can choose to deny the item before its effect takes place.
The Target cannot use the denied item until the Start of their Next Turn.
This item can be used at anytime.
NOTE: During Dice Intermission/Standoff, the item deny applies during their Current OR Next Turn.

Name: Sticky Putty
Description: Choose a Player, they gain -2 Lingering Move Points whenever they use an item this Turn.

Name: Divine Spear Gungnir
Description:
Choose a Space anywhere on the Board and launch your spear to skewer any Player in that Space at the Start of your Next Turn.
All Players in the Space get Stunned, and Lose 15 Gold and Gain -5 Lingering Move Points for each item they have.

Name: Potion of Shrouding Fog
Description:
Create Shrouding Fog in a 5x5 area which lasts until the Start of your Next Turn.
All item Range cannot extend into the 5x5 area, and all items cannot be used within the Fog.

Name: AI Generated Coupon
Description:
Roll your Dice to gain a discount equal to 5 times the Dice Result for the next item you purchase this Turn.
NOTE: Overwrites the Shop Discount.

Name: Laundromat
Description: Pass Trigger, Gain 10 Temporary Gold

Name: Inventor's Lab
Description: Pass Trigger, Choose 1 of 3 Passives to get for free.

Name: Storeroom
Description: Pass Trigger, Gain a Chest Reward.

Name: Tome of Dark Arcana
Description:
Record every unique Curse that you've obtained while this is held:
By sacrificing an item with a Cost of 10 or more, you can Accurse an Item with any chosen Curse that you've recorded, adding a new effect alongside the original item's effect.
When an Accursed item is used, the targeted Player additionally Gains the chosen Curse. (not Forcefully Gained)
NOTE: Effects may vary but cannot be applied on n/a Range items.

Name: Steam Engine
Description: While held, if you hold 2 or more Passives, Gain 3 Gold at the Start of every Turn.

Name: Golden Idol
Description: While held, if you reach the End, Gain 20 Gold and Destroy this item.

Name: Bingo Card
Description:
While held, if you have 5 Unique items with the exact same Theme, you can exchange all the items for Gold at 7 times their Tier.
NOTE: Does NOT include this item.

Name: Loyalty Card
Description:
While held, track the number of items you've bought at the Shop.
The 5th item you buy costs 50% less and resets the counter.
NOTE: Overwrites the original 1st item Shop Discount.

Name: Sleeping Cap
Description:
Lingering Move Points can no longer be removed or do anything (Preventing Moving and are no longer removed by Moving).
When you get Stunned, instead gain 6 Lingering Move Points.
If you Start your Turn with 20 Lingering Move Points or more, roll 1D2 at the Start of Every Turn, where rolling a 1 immediately Ends your Current Turn to Fall Asleep for Next Turn.
Falling Asleep automatically Skips your entire Turn, removes 20 Lingering Move Points, you cannot use any Reroll or Constant items and any Player who Passes you while you are Asleep can choose to Steal one of your items OR Steal 10 Gold.
You can Move 1 Space forwards to gain -2 Lingering Move Points, can be done at any time as many times as you want.
Lvl 1 Gain 10 Lingering Move Points and roll 1D2 to Fall Asleep at the End of your Turn if you have 20 Lingering Move Points or more. Cheaper Refill. (Refill 12)
Lvl 2 On the Turn that you wake up, remove 9 Lingering Move Points at the End of your Turn.
Lvl 3 When you have to roll 1D2 to Fall Asleep, rolling a 2 allows you to choose another Player within a 5x5 to roll a 1D2 at the Start of their Turn to Fall Asleep instead. (Refill 10)

Name: LEGACY Credit Card
Description:
Lvl 1: Can gain Temporary Gold for a debt which can be paid for at any time. After at least 1 Round has passed, increase interest by 1.05 per Round.
Lvl 2: All Shop items have a 10% cashback.
Lvl 3: Buying items gives you reward points based on paid price, T1=5 points and increases by 5 per tier.
NOTE: Reaching the end applies all debt to user. (in negative gold)
NOTE: Debt can only be paid with Gold.

Name: Stone Tablet
Description:
Track the Tier of the next 3 Quests you complete.
After the 3rd Quest is complete, reset the tracker and Gain a Random free Quest Reward equal to the lowest Tier tracked.

Name: Mimic Tooth
Description:
While held, roll 1D2 when opening a Chest:
1 = Lose 15 Gold and 1 Chosen item in your Inventory.
2 = Pick 2 out of 6 items instead from the Chest Reward.

Name: Gas Mortar
Description: Pass Trigger, Create Gas Clouds in a 3x3 on any Space.

Name: Pressurized Pincushion
Description:
Throw a Pressurized Pincushion which explodes in a 5x5 at the End of your Next Turn.
All Players within the 5x5 Explosion Gain -8 Lingering Move Points and Forcefully Gain the "Cursed Pin" Curse.
If a Player already has Lingering Move Points, they Forcefully Gain another "Cursed Pin" Curse.

Name: Essential Oil Diffuser
Description:
If you Start your Turn within a 3x3 on this, Lose 3 Gold and Roll 1D2 before rolling your Move Dice.
1 = Your Move Dice now makes you go backwards.

Name: Mounted Raygun (Active Piece)
Description:
All Players within Line of Sight inf Lose 7 Gold, decreases based on Distance away from the Player.
Refill +8

Name: Javelin
Description:
Target Loses 5 Gold and Moves 2 Spaces in the direction of the projectile.
If the Target moves into a Wall/Ceiling, they Gain -6 Lingering Move Points.

Name: Epic Sauce
Description:
For the next 3 Turns, apply this effect:
Whenever you use an item that targets another Player, they Lose 3 Gold and gain Disadvantage.
NOTE: Disadvantage stacks.
NOTE: This effect also applies to your items used on yourself.

Name: Trap on a Keychain
Description:
Attune 3 T1 Hazards.
Whenever a Target triggers a Hazard, choose one of your Attuned Hazard to additionally apply to them.
NOTE: Duplicate Hazards do not apply twice to the Target.

Name: Treehouse Schematics
Description: Whenever you use a Snake/Ladder, gain a Random Building.

Name: Gold Dust
Description:
Gain 30 Temporary Gold.
At the End of your Turn, Lose all your items in your Inventory.
NOTE: Does not apply to Artifacts or anything outside the Inventory.

Name: Skull of Gold
Description: While held, Temporary Gold does not expire.

Name: Laggy Key
Description:
When opening a Chest, you can choose to roll 1D2 after gaining the item as many times as you want:
1 = Open the Chest again to gain another item.
2 = Lose all items obtained from the Chest, key effect ends.
NOTE: This preserves Key effects.

Name: Cutlass
Description:
The Target can choose the User to either:
Option 1. Steal 8 Gold and the User chooses 1 of your items to Steal.
Option 2. Steal 13 Gold and the Target Forcefully Gains a "Wound" Curse.
NOTE: The Target can choose for you to Steal 0 items if they have 0 items.

Name: Handcannon
Description:
Destroy all Buildings, Hazards, Snakes/Ladders in a 3x3.
Immediately Activate/Explode all Grenade-like Temporary Creations in AoE.
All Players inside the 3x3 AoE Lose 10 Gold.

Name: Dream 3000 Cartridge
Description:
Give a Target 8 Lingering Move Points.
If they now have 20 or more Lingering Move Points, Roll 1D2 to make them Fall Asleep.

Name: Poisonous Dart
Description:
Give a Target -5 Lingering Move Points.
If they now have -6 or more Lingering Move Points, they also Gain a "Mushroom Spores" Curse.

Name: Dungeon Core Panic Button
Description:
Activate ALL Hazards to Trigger at the Start of the User's Next Turn.
Players within the Hazard AoE Trigger the Hazard's effect.
NOTE: This does not apply to Spiky Helmet.
NOTE: Regular Hazards only apply on the 1 Space AoE that it's on.

Name: Comically Large Boot
Description:
Drop down 1 Space.
If there is a Player beneath you, they Lose 5 Gold and Move Down 1 Space as well.
NOTE: Still considered Passing the Player.

Name: Enchanted Book
Description:
Once obtained, this turns into a Random enchantment from the "Enchantment Table" Building.
This item is an Item Modifier which can be applied to another item.

Name: Black Hole Bomb
Description:
Throw a Black Hole Bomb which activates at the Start of the User's Next Turn.
Once activated, all Players within the 3x3 AoE Move to the center of the Black Hole and Roll 1D2 for Stun.
At the Start of every Round, increase the AoE from 3x3 > 5x5 > 7x7, repeating the same effect above.
All Temporary Creations, Buildings and Hazards are Destroyed, with all Players inside Losing 5 Gold per thing Destroyed.
The Black Hole disappears at the Start of the Next Round after the 7x7.

Name: Earthquake Rod
Description:
Choose a Building and Destroy it.
All Targets within the AoE Lose 10 Gold with a 1D2 for Stun per Building Destroyed.
NOTE: Does not apply to Premade Buildings.

Name: Snake Rifle
Description:
Create a Snake starting from you to the Target Space.
If you hit a Target, they Lose 10 Gold, Gain 15 Temporary Gold, and Forcefully Gain a "Snake Venom" Curse.

Name: Obsidian Greatsword
Description: Transfer all your Lingering Move Points to All Targets within the Line of Sight 3.

Name: LEGACY Skull of Gold
Description: Gain 50 Temporary Gold, lose 1 Gold at the Start of every Turn until you reach 0 Gold.

Name: Sweeping Guillotine
Description:
At the Start of your Next Turn, sweep all Targets within a horizontal 5 Space wide AoE centered on this Hazard.
All Players inside Lose 25 Gold and Forcefully Gain two "Wound" Curses.

Name: Funny Fungi Patch
Description: Forcefully Gain 2 "Mushroom Spores" Curses.

Name: Enchantment Table
Description:
Pass Trigger, Choose an item and Enchant it by adding one of these Item Modifiers:
----- Knockback II -----
Adjacent, Line of Sight, and Projectile Ranged items now make the Target Move 2 Spaces in the chosen direction.
NOTE: This enchantment applies first over the item's effect.
NOTE: Using a Line of Sight item as a 7x7 or 9x9 Range using Radio Antenna (and similar) does NOT apply this effect.
NOTE: Grenade Knockback only works if placed directly on top of them.
----- Sharpness V -----
Adjacent, Line of Sight, and Projectile Ranged items now make the Target Lose 10 Gold and Forcefully Gain a "Wound" Curse.
----- Protection IV -----
While held, this will negate the next effect applied to you containing these afflictions: Steal, Lose, Lingering Move Point, Forcefully Gain, Gain "Curse".
NOTE: This will negate both the Lingering Move Point and Lose Gold of a Gas Cloud, as it's one effect with 2 afflictions.
NOTE: This will negate all Hazards triggered at the Start of your Turn.
----- Thorns II -----
While held, the next effect directly targeting you from another Player's item will Steal 8 Gold from them.
NOTE: The effect targeting you is NOT negated and still applies.
NOTE: Only applies to directly targeted, so Grenades and placed Hazards do not count.

Name: Pirate Armory
Description:
Pass Trigger, roll 1D4 to Gain one of the following:
1 = Blunderbuss
2 = Cutlass
3 = Handcannon
4 = 20 Gold

Name: Ground-to-Air Flak Gun Mark II
Description:
While you are on this Space, you can choose as many items in your Inventory for the Target to Gain.
The Target Loses Gold equal to the item's Cost+Tier.
NOTE: If an item with "Melancholic Recollection" is regained, it cannot be retransferred this Turn.
NOTE: Cannot transfer Curses.

Name: Scrapyard Shredder
Description: Pass Trigger, Choose an item in your inventory to Destroy and gain Temporary Gold equal to its cost.

Name: Transmutation Circle
Description:
Pass Trigger, Exchange all your items for Gold based on its Cost.
Curses are instead Exchanged for "Rocks".

Name: Salt Cube
Description:
Whenever another Player triggers a Hazard, Steal 7 Gold.
If you Trigger a Hazard, Lose 7 Gold.

Name: Tourist's Memory Book
Description:
Record the next 6 Unique Buildings you've Triggered:
After recording 6 Buildings, you can Trigger any of the 6 Building abilities (with the Fee) at any time.
Once you use a recorded Building's ability, it can no longer be used again.

Name: Vine Lasso
Description:
Whenever you use a Snake/Ladder, modify the next item's effect for this Turn:
Snake: The next Player you directly Target Loses 5 Gold, Gains 10 Temporary Gold and Forcefully Gains the "Snake Venom" Curse.
Ladder: The next Player you directly Target Moves 6 Spaces Forwards or Backwards.

Name: Wound
Description:
Does nothing and cannot be removed at all.
Every turn, roll 1D6 to Destroy this Curse.
NOTE: The roll is separate for each instance of the "Wound" Curse.

Name: Mushroom Spores
Description:
While held, whenever you Trigger a Hazard, Replace a chosen item with a random Curse.
Use: For every Hazard you trigger next Turn, all Targets in a 5x5 on User AoE Forcefully Gains a "Wound" Curse.

Name: Knockback II
Description:
Item Modifier, Adjacent, Line of Sight, and Projectile Ranged items now make the Target move 2 Spaces in the chosen direction.
NOTE: This enchantment applies first over the item's effect.
NOTE: Using a Line of Sight item as a 7x7 or 9x9 Range using Radio Antenna (and similar) does NOT apply this effect.
NOTE: Grenade Knockback only works if placed directly on top of them.

Name: Sharpness V
Description: Item Modifier, Adjacent, Line of Sight, and Projectile Ranged items now make the Target Lose 10 Gold and Forcefully Gain a "Wound" Curse.

Name: Protection IV
Description:
Item Modifier, While held, this will negate the next effect applied to you containing these afflictions: Steal, Lose, Lingering Move Point, Forcefully Gain, Gain "Curse".
NOTE: This will negate both the Lingering Move Point and Lose Gold of a Gas Cloud, as it's one effect with 2 afflictions.
NOTE: This will negate all Hazards triggered at the Start of your Turn.

Name: Thorns II
Description:
Item Modifier, While held, the next effect directly targeting you from another Player's item will Steal 8 Gold from them.
NOTE: The effect targeting you is NOT negated and still applies.
NOTE: Only applies to directly targeted, so Grenades and placed Hazards do not count.

Name: Mosquito Needle
Description:
If you End your Turn on a Player, Steal 5 Gold from them.
This increases by 5 Gold for every successful streak of being on a Player up to a maximum of 25 Gold.
The multiplier resets after breaking the streak.

Name: Gunpowder Pepper Shaker
Description:
Item Modifier, When used, create a 5x5 Explosion on you.
All Players (including you) inside the AoE Lose 10 Gold and Destroy 1 chosen item.

Name: Napalm Bath Bomb
Description:
Explodes in a 3x3 at the Start of the Next Round over the span of 3 times.
All Players inside Lose 10 Gold or Discard 1 chosen item.

Name: Temple Pedestal
Description:
Pass Trigger, Replace 1 item in your inventory with the Golden Idol and Roll 1D4:
1-3 = Lose 10 Gold and either Destroy a chosen item or Gain a "Wound" Curse.
4 = Nothing happens.

Name: Petrification Rune
Description: Replace 2 of your items with Rocks.

Name: Neutralizing Bandages
Description:
Destroy all Wounds and Replace all your Curses with Wounds.
Gain 5 Gold for each Non-Wound Curse converted.

Name: Cleansing Bath
Description: Pass Trigger (1 Curse), Gain a "Natural Bog Water" item.

Name: Bolas
Description:
Target gains -2 Lingering Move Points for each item in their inventory.
If they already have Lingering Move Points, instead divide their next Move Roll by 2 (rounded down).
